'''Time Stands Still (at the Iron Hill)''' is the thirteenth track for [[Blind Guardian]]'s Tolkien themed album, ''[[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]]''. It tells the story of [[Fingolfin]]'s ride to [[Angband]] after the [[Dagor Bragollach]], his challenge to [[Morgoth]], and his battle and defeat.
